oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wooden box stencilled CROSBY
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wooden box stencilled "CROSBY". Item belonged to Pvt. Joel S. Crosby, Co, B, 17th Ind. Inf. Regt., USA. Following discharge, he served in the 21st Ind. Arty. Regt., USA (also known as the 1st Ind. Hvy. Arty.) He served in the Mobile (Ala.) Campaign,; 1864-1865. Crosby lived in Spring City, Rhea County (Tenn.) after the war.
